name: Leroy FEARS, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA DEPARTMENT OF CORRECTIONS, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of April, 2009, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
